issue.title: ModelListWidget doesn't display joint info if link has same name

content.raw:
We don't check for unique name between joints and links, but we should. If the UR10 model has the same name for both a joint and a link, then the UR10 model is in error.

To solve this issue we could:

1. Add a check for unique joint and link names when a model is loaded.
1. Output an error if a model fails this check.
1.  We can optionally rename a joint or link to make sure the model still loads.
content.html:
We don't check for unique name between joints and links, but we should. If the UR10 model has the same name for both a joint and a link, then the UR10 model is in error.

To solve this issue we could:

  1. Add a check for unique joint and link names when a model is loaded.
  2. Output an error if a model fails this check.
  3. We can optionally rename a joint or link to make sure the model still loads.
